Title: Lemonhope Part One
Writer: Tom Herpich (story), Tom Herpich, Steve Wolfhard
Actors: Jeremy Shada, Hynden Walch, Justin Roiland, Dee Bradley Baker
Plot: Young Lemonhope leaves the candy kingdom after a deep desire to be free of all responsibilities grips him. So he ventures out on his own with nothing more than a lute and hope to find freedom.
